LanguageData.CLB_DontTouchSwitch.label: Self-detonation device
LanguageData.CLB_DontTouchSwitch.description: This device sends a signal to an antenna attached to a small chip to blow up anyone wearing a self-destruct device.
LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb_Remote.label: Self-destruct device (remote)
LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb_Remote.description: This is a small chip with an explosion module. It causes an explosion upon death.
LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb.label: Self-destruct device (not remote)
LanguageData.CLB_LivingBomb.description: This is a small chip with an explosion module. It causes an explosion upon death.
